title: Chasms on Dione
description: While not bursting with activity like its sister satellite Enceladus, the surface of Dione is definitely not boring. Some parts of the surface are covered by linear features, called chasmata, which provide dramatic contrast to the round impact craters that typically cover moons.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
